definition: to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order
name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people

sentences.english: The author studied the standard of naming the comedian in a variety show in the light of the historical development.
sentences.chinese: 本文以歷史發展的眼光去把握俳優的定名。

sentences.english: In 1998 it was named officially as Jinan Children's Art Theater.
sentences.chinese: 1998年正式定名爲濟南市兒童藝術劇院。

sentences.english: In Guangxi, Isoptera are widespread, and 133 species are nominated.
sentences.chinese: 廣西地區等翅目昆蟲採到並定名的種類已有133種。

sentences.english: It is called Allhallows or Hallowmas by the Church.
sentences.chinese: 後來被教堂定名爲萬聖節。

sentences.english: The author entitled his book "On Poetry".
sentences.chinese: 作者把自己的書定名爲《論詩》。

sentences.english: The new version, entitled The Messenger of Peace, is currently still in development.
sentences.chinese: 重拍版本定名爲《和平信使》，目前尚在製作之中。
這個廠定名爲東風造船廠。

sentences.english: To the early years of Qing Emperor Kangxi officially named as Zhouzhuang Zhen.
sentences.chinese: 至清康熙初年正式定名爲周莊鎮。

sentences.english: These Rules shall be called the "CMI Uniform Rules for Sea Waybills".
sentences.chinese: 本規則定名爲“國際海事委員會海運單統一規則。”

sentences.english: Flowers, take meaning method. based on enterprise with emblem.
sentences.chinese: 定名長安花，取意同會徽。

sentences.english: Folk tales tell of the dragon losing its power when it is named.
sentences.chinese: 民間傳說中的龍，當牠被定名爲龍之時就失去了力量。

sentences.english: The classification and name of volcanic rock are mainly based on the contents of main petrogenetic mineral.
sentences.chinese: 火山岩的分類定名主要依據主要造岩礦物的含量。

sentences.english: But there are some problems with it's naming of bronze wares.
sentences.chinese: 該書的器名定名存在不少問題。

sentences.english: Denominate of this film of short duration is " autobiography ".
sentences.chinese: 這部影片暫定名爲《自傳》。

sentences.english: Xinyang poetry is a phenomenon, so why did they have to in order to "gang poetry" name?
sentences.chinese: 信陽詩歌是一種現象，爲啥要以“詩幫”定名？

sentences.english: Assorting and naming of volcanic rock is mainly based on the content of main petrogenetic mineral.
sentences.chinese: 主要造岩礦物的含量是火山岩分類定名的主要依據。

definition: to give a name to/to dub/to christen/to designate/named after/naming
to name/to be named/to christen/to seek fame
to be published (of art, literary works etc)/to come out/to take shape/to see the light of day
old term/old way of referring to sth
to be generally referred to (as)/generic term
compiled and published by Imperial command (old)
to be called/to be known as
